mapper.insert: INSERT INTO frecommend(frecommendno, memberno, fcateno, contentsno, seq, rdate) VALUES(frecommend_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{fcateno}, #{contentsno}, #{seq}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT frecommendno, memberno, fcateno, contentsno, seq, rdate FROM frecommend ORDER BY recommendno DESC
